description: Tracked bugs in game data discovered through reverse engineering and automated auditing. A bug is fixed if either the data changes to match the description OR the description changes to match the data.

bugs.summary: Ability targets 1 instead of 2 units

details.description_says: Increases 45% of DMG of the 2 Phantasma team members with highest ATK.

bugs.analysis: Game code defaults count to 1 when not specified. All other max_atk abilities have explicit count<N>. This ability is missing it, so it only affects 1 target despite description saying 2.

bugs.summary: Assist card has skill assigned but cannot use it

details.skill_description: Restore {value} HP to self, increase crit rate for a limited time {delay1}
details.expected_description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

bugs.analysis: All 133 Assist cards have skill data in the config, but Assist cards cannot actively use skills in battle. The skill description shown is misleading - should display the standard Assist text instead.

bugs.summary: Crit DMG percentage mismatch (35% vs 15%)

details.description_says: Increases 35% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.

bugs.analysis: Description says 35% Crit DMG but data shows only 15% - the ability is much weaker than described.

bugs.summary: Skill says DEF but applies damage reduction (SHIELD)

details.description_says: increase {delay1} DEF to targets for a limited time

bugs.analysis: Description mentions DEF (defense stat) but the actual effect is SHIELD (percentage damage reduction). These are mechanically different - DEFENSE modifies the flat defense stat while SHIELD reduces incoming damage by a percentage.

bugs.summary: Missing drop rate effect - description says 3% but not in data

details.description_says: Increases 5% of the number of soulstones received from battle and 3% of battle reward drop rate.

bugs.analysis: Description mentions two effects (5% soulstones, 3% drop rate) but data only contains the soulstone bonus. The drop rate effect (ITEM) appears to be missing entirely.

bugs.summary: Max HP percentage mismatch (15% vs 10%)

details.description_says: Increases 15% of Max HP

bugs.analysis: Description says 15% Max HP but data shows 10%. The heal over time (2.5%) is correct.

bugs.summary: ATK speed percentage mismatch (25% vs 23%)

details.description_says: Increases 25% of ATK speed

bugs.analysis: Description says 25% ATK speed but data shows 23%. The DMG boost (15%) is correct.

bugs.summary: Burn proc rate mismatch (10% vs 25%)

details.description_says: Normal attacks by Divina team members have a 10% chance of inflicting Burn.

bugs.analysis: Description says 10% chance but actual proc rate is 25% - the ability is stronger than described.

bugs.summary: HP regen percentage mismatch (2% vs 3.5%)

details.description_says: Restores 2% HP every 5 seconds.

bugs.analysis: Description says 2% but actual heal is 3.5% - the ability is stronger than described.

bugs.summary: DMG reduction percentage mismatch (15% vs 10%)

details.description_says: Reduces 15% of DMG taken

bugs.analysis: Description says 15% damage reduction but data shows 10%. The heal over time (2%) is correct.

bugs.summary: DMG reduction percentage mismatch (15% vs 10%)

details.description_says: Reduces 15% of DMG taken

bugs.analysis: Description says 15% damage reduction but data shows 10%. The skill DMG boost (20%) is correct.

bugs.summary: HP restore percentage mismatch (10% vs 8%)

details.description_says: Restores 10% HP to Anima team members

bugs.analysis: Description says 10% heal but data shows 8%.

bugs.summary: Crit DMG percentage mismatch (15% vs 35%)

details.description_says: Increases 15% of Crit DMG when Mikazuki Munechika is on the team.

bugs.analysis: Description says 15% Crit DMG but data shows 35% - the ability is much stronger than described.

bugs.analysis: Description says 10% chance but actual proc rate is 15% - the ability is stronger than described.

bugs.summary: Crit DMG percentage mismatch (80% vs 60%)

details.description_says: increases 80% Crit DMG

bugs.analysis: Description says 80% Crit DMG but data shows 60%. The crit rate (70%) is correct.

bugs.summary: DMG percentage mismatch (45% vs 35%)

details.description_says: Increases 45% of DMG.

bugs.analysis: Description says 45% DMG boost but data shows 35%.

bugs.summary: Crit DMG percentage mismatch (35% vs 40%)

details.description_says: Increases 35% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.

bugs.analysis: Description says 35% Crit DMG but data shows 40% - the ability is stronger than described.

bugs.summary: Crit rate percentage mismatch (43% vs 37%)

details.description_says: Increases 43% of crit rate

bugs.analysis: Description says 43% crit rate but data shows 37%. The crit DMG (100%) is correct.

bugs.summary: Drop rate percentage mismatch (25% vs 20%)

details.description_says: Increases battle reward drop rate by 25%.

bugs.analysis: Description says 25% drop rate but data shows 20%.

bugs.summary: Crit rate percentage mismatch (40% vs 35%)

details.description_says: Increases 40% of crit rate

bugs.analysis: Description says 40% crit rate but data shows 35%. The crit DMG (90%) is correct.

bugs.summary: Attack Speed percentage mismatch (50% vs 45%)

details.description_says: Increases Attack Speed by 50% when 'Oberon' is present.

bugs.analysis: Description says 50% Attack Speed but data shows 45%.

bugs.summary: ATK speed percentage mismatch (25% vs 27%)

details.description_says: Increases 25% of ATK speed.

bugs.analysis: Description says 25% ATK speed but data shows 27% - the ability is slightly stronger than described.

bugs.summary: Non-stackable ability missing 'once per team' text

details.description_says: Restores 30% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
details.expected_text: Description should mention that effects don't stack

bugs.analysis: Ability has o=false (OverlayFlag) which triggers CanApplyTeamOverlayAbility check. Only the first copy's ability applies team-wide; subsequent copies are skipped. Players may build teams with duplicates expecting stacked effects.

bugs.summary: Non-stackable self-buff ability missing 'once per team' text

details.description_says: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; Increases 10% of skill DMG.
details.expected_text: Description should mention that effects don't stack

bugs.analysis: Self-targeting ability with o=false (OverlayFlag). Only the first copy's ability activates; the second copy's ability is entirely skipped and doesn't even apply to itself. Players may use duplicate cards expecting both to get the buff.

bugs.summary: Wrong crit stat: has 750 (melee value) instead of 2250 (ranged value)

details.explanation: Ranged units should have crit rate of 2250 but this card has 750 which is the melee value

bugs.analysis: Grim Reaper [HW] is a Ranged unit but has crit stat of 750 instead of the expected 2250. This significantly reduces her damage potential.

bugs.summary: Wrong crit stat: has 750 (melee value) instead of 2250 (ranged value)

details.explanation: Ranged units should have crit rate of 2250 but this card has 750 which is the melee value

bugs.analysis: Snow Sprite is a Ranged unit but has crit stat of 750 instead of the expected 2250. This significantly reduces damage potential.

bugs.summary: CHIT_ATK effect missing duration - permanent buff on attack_skill trigger
bugs.analysis: This is the ONLY attack_skill ability with CHIT_ATK that has no duration. All 9 other similar abilities have 8 wave duration. The CHIT effect on the same ability has 4 wave duration, suggesting CHIT_ATK should also have had a duration but it was omitted. When duration is missing, the game treats it as permanent (time=-1.0f). Since this triggers on every skill use (attack_skill), the +60% crit damage buff is applied permanently each time the card uses its skill.

categories.unit_type: Issues related to card type (Assist, Melee, etc.)
categories.effect_type: Wrong effect type applied (e.g., DEFENSE vs SHIELD)
categories.stackable: Non-stackable abilities (o=false) missing 'once per team' text - affects all targeting including self_ime
categories.missing_duration: Effect missing duration parameter - becomes permanent when it should be temporary

severity_levels.visual: Bug is cosmetic/display only - actual effect differs from description
